'''Scenery and Sentiment''' are videos released by official ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' media that feature illustrated scenery from various regions in [[Teyvat]]. They are created by HoYoverse & {{w|Sun Creature Studio}} with music by HOYO-MiX. They are available as a [https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqWr7dyJNgLJj5fSi_-o4-k7wJnRehSP0 playlist] on the official Genshin Impact YouTube channel.
